game.title: The Missing Scroll
game.objective: Retrieve the missing scroll from the catacombs.
game.description: The ancient scroll of knowledge has been stolen and hidden in the catacombs. Bring it back to the temple for a reward.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet.

task.description: The catacombs are located on the outskirts of the city. Take the eastern road and follow it until you reach the entrance at 342 Evernight Lane.

task.objective: Find the scroll in the hidden chamber.
task.description: Search for Room B-10, where the scroll is hidden. Don't forget to bring a torch.

task.objective: Return to Archmage Elminster at the temple.
task.description: Bring the scroll back to the temple, where you'll meet him outside the main entrance. He's expecting you at 10 AM sharp.
